title: Alias for columns in dataset not reflected in expression builder
description: When setting an alias for columns in a dataset, the alias is not shown in the expression builder when selecting the dataset. The expression builder still shows the old column names instead of the aliases.
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases that were set for the columns.
EB: The expression builder should display the aliases that were set for the columns in the dataset.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a dataset with columns.
2. Set aliases for the columns.
3. Open the expression builder.
4. Select the dataset in the expression builder.
5. Observe that the old column names are shown instead of the aliases.
